casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert Dwayne LEWIS No. 141PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 05, 2018 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Lewis, Robert Dwayne. Milind Kumar Dongre, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General. Thomas J. Campbell, Assistant Attorney General.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st of June 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
